texts.es: El grupo solidario lo integran cuatro socias laboriosas, lo coordina la señora Heisell de 26 años de edad, casada y madre de un hijo de catorce meses quien es su motivación para superarse y así lograr ofrecerle mejores condiciones de vida, es propietaria de un taller de costura desde hace seis años en su domicilio, con los créditos anteriores la socia ha logrado aumentar su negocio por tal razón la socia solicita el crédito para aumentar la producción de su negocio, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de manta, lana, dacron, hilo, botones, elástico, etc., con los créditos anteriores la socia logró aumentar el negocio y la compra de electrodomésticos. Las otras socias son las señoras Carmen de 22 años de edad, dedicada a la compra-ventas de frutas desde hace dos años en el mercado de Masaya y el crédito lo requiere para la compra de melón, Antonia de 53 años de edad comerciante de frutas y verduras en el mercado de la municipalidad desde hace cinco años con el crédito comprará melón y ayote, y la señora Marling de 21 años de edad dedicada a la compra-venta de cosechas con cuatro años de experiencia en el mercado de la municipalidad.
texts.en:
This group is made up of four hardworking businesswomen.  The group coordinator is Heisell.  She is twenty-six years old, is married, and has one son who is 14 months old; he is her motivation for moving herself forward, since she wants to be able to offer him a better life.  She owns a sewing workshop, and has been running this business for the past six years out of her home.  With the previous loans, she has been able to grow her business.  For this reason, she is requesting a new loan.  She would like to grow the production of her business by investing in the purchase of cloth, wool, synthetic material, thread, buttons, elastic bands, etc.  With her past loans, she was able to grow her business by also buying small appliances.  

The other members in the group are Carmen, Antonia, and Marling.  Carmen is twenty-two years old and has made a living buying and selling fruit for two years in the Masaya market; her portion of the loan will permit her to buy melons.  Antonia is fifty-three years old and has worked for five years in the local market buying and selling fruits and vegetables; she will use her portion of the loan to buy melon and squash.  Marling is twenty-one years old and has four years of experience buying and selling harvest crops in the local market.

loans.use: to buy cloth, wool, synthetic material, thread, buttons, elastic bands, etc.

loans.name: De Monchita Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario lo integran tres socias laboriosas, lo coordina la señora Gladys de 35 años de edad, madre soltera de ocho hijos de los cuales seis dependen de ella, se dedica a la comercialización de pescados en el mercado de Masaya desde que tenía 20 años de edad, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de filete de tiburón, filete de pargo, macarela, róbalo, etc., con el fin de aumentar sus ganancias y así ayudarle a sus hijos para su superación. Las otras socias son las señoras Victoria de 56 años comerciante de perecederos, el negocio lo impulso desde hace veinticinco años, y Josefa de 44 años de edad, comerciante de productos varios como es arroz, carbón, trigo, manzanilla, etc., desde hace veinte años en el mercado de Masaya.
texts.en: This group has three hard-working members. The coordinator is 35 year old Gladys, a single mother of 8 children, 6 of whom are dependent upon her. She has been selling fish Masaya market since she was 20 years old. She seeks a loan to buy a variety of fish fillets, such as shark, sea bass, etc. with the goal of increasing her earnings and in this way helping her children become successful adults. The other members of the group are 56 year old Josefa, who sells perishables, a business she has had for 25 years, and 44 year old Josefa, who has been selling various products such as rice, charcoal, wheat, tea, etc. for 20 years in the Masaya market.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fish fillets to sell.

loans.name: Anita Limbani

texts.es:
Limbani tiene 48 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, tiene un hijo a su cargo, vive en casa propia, en el distrito de Oyotun, una zona rural donde su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la compra y venta de animales de corral desde hace 3 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, donde ofrece a la venta carne de gallinas y patos, cuenta con clientela de su distrito y restaurants de la zona.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de cuyes para cría y engorde y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Anita Limbani is forty-eight years old and is single.  She has one son and they live together in a house that she owns in the district of Oyotún.  This is a rural area where residents make a living in agriculture, trade, and livestock.  It is located in the Cutervo province, which belongs to the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Peru.

She has made a living buying and selling small farm animals for the past three years.  She runs her business out of her home, and also sells the chicken and duck meat.  Her customers live in her same district and restaurants in the greater area also buy from her.

She has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternative for 500 nuevos soles in order to purchase guinea pigs so that she may raise and fatten them.  In doing this, she will be able to generate a higher income for her family.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs so that she can raise and fatten them.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es:
El comedor de María Auxiliadora siempre goza de mucha clientela. No es para menos, puesto a que prepara una gran variedad de deliciosos platillos que llaman la atención del público.  Se caracteriza por ser una excelente cocinera, además recibe a sus clientes con una enorme sonrisa,  y  los hace sentirse como en su casa. 
Su negocio cada día prospera  por su  rica sazón. Estos dones los  aprendió  de su madre y abuelita, quienes preparaban gustosos platillo.  María Auxiliadora desea mantener este mismo ritmo de ventas y desea anexar otra variedad de comidas en su menú.  Ella recurrió a KIVA MiCrédito, para conseguir el capital necesario  y poder  comprar granos básicos, frutas, vegetales y condimentos.  Su propósito es aumentar la clientela y lograr más ganancias.
texts.en:
María Auxiliadora's food always pleases her customers. This isn't an understatement, as she prepares a large variety of delicious dishes that call the public's attention. She describes herself as an excellent cook, in addition she welcomes her customers with an enormous smile and makes them feel at home. Her business prospers every day because of this. She learned these dishes from her mother and grandmother, who prepared tasty dishes.

María Auxiliadora wishes to maintain this same rhythm in her sales and wants to add a greater variety of dishes to her menu. She approached KIVA MiCrédito to obtain the needed funds and be able to buy basic grains, fruit, vegetables and condiments. Her goal is to increase her customers and achieve greater profits.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, fruit, vegetables and condiments.

loans.name: Bisharifa

texts.ru:
Бишарифа очень веселая женщина в возрасте 45 лет, она замужем имеет 2 детей. Ей нравиться заниматься откормом скота, это ремесло имеет много препятствий и трудностей, потому что скот может заболеть если не вовремя сделать прививку или другие необходимые лекарства. Если плохо ухаживать и плохо кормить скот может похудеть и не давать потомство. Поэтому в бизнесе помогает сын и муж.

Бишарифа положительная женщина имеет большую дружную семью. Для содержания  своей семьи Бишарифе приходится много трудиться. Она занимается животноводством и переработкой молока. В этом деле ей помогает и муж. Полученный доход от содержания крупного рогатого скота и продажи молока они расходуют на семью и понемногу помогают пожилым родителям. Бишарифа хочет дать хорошее образование детям . Это является её мечтой так, как сама он не смогла получить хорошее образование. Для воплощения её мечты в реальность она должна трудиться ещё больше и увеличивать свой бизнес. Для увеличения поголовья ей не достает небольшой суммы. Бишарифа брала в прошлом кредит в "Арванде" и так, как обслуживание и условия предоставления кредита в этом банке удовлетворяют его потребности она решила повторно обратиться в Арванд.Сейчас она обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Она очень надеется на поддержку.
texts.en: Bisharifa is a vivacious woman of 45. She is married and has 2 kids. She likes raising cattle, this trade has it's benefits and difficulties, as the animals can get sick if they aren't immunized in time and can require other medicines. If the animals are badly taken care off they will drop weight and stop having offspring. Bisharifa is a positive woman and has a loving and tight-knit family, but to support her family she has to work very hard. She raises cattle and makes dairy products. Bisharifa's husband and son help take care of the animals. Profits from the farm are used to support the family and help out her aging parents. Bisharifa's dreams is to give a good educations to her children, as she herself wasn't able to afford it. To make her dream a reality she has to work harder and harder and expand her livestock business. But she is lacking some funds necessary to expand her herd. In the past Bisharifa took out a loan with "Arvand" and as she likes the conditions of the loan she decided to return to "Arvand" for another loan. She hopes you will be able to support her dream.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase palm oil and gari to expand her business.

loans.name: José Santos

texts.es:
José de 41 años de edad, es un agricultor que solo estudio segundo grado de nivel académico,  está acompañado la esposa se dedica a los domésticos, han procreado 4 hijos los cuales todos están en la escuela.
José  se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía  15 años de edad,  este trabajo se lo enseño el papá;  pero también se dedica a la albañilería, cuando le sale un trabajo de albañil busca personas que le trabajen la agricultura y él se va  a trabajar de albañil ya que ese trabajo le genera más ingresos a él y de ahí paga a  las personas que le ayuden. El trabajo le queda a una distancia de 20 minutos y él viaja en una bicicleta en un horario de las 6 a la 1 de la tarde.

El préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar 4 sacos de abono que ahorita la milpa lo necesita para regarle a 14,000 metros cuadrados de cultivo que tiene sembrado, pero también comprara  un litro de veneno para combatir una plaga que le esta afectando al maíz,  esto le ayudara mucho porque con el dinero puede comprar el fertilizante que es bueno para esa plaga

Los sueños de José son seguir cultivando la tierra para que a los hijos no les falte la comida en la casa y también prepararlos darles el estudio para que se preparen académicamente y sabe que eso les servirá mucho a ellos y esto lo lograra con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo
texts.en: Jose is 41 years old, and is a farmer who only attended school until the second grade.  He lives with his spouse who is a stay-at-home parent.  They have four children who all attend school.  Jose has worked in agriculture since he was 15, having learned this work from his father.  He also works as a bricklayer.  When he gets a bricklaying job he looks for people to help him with the farming and goes to work, because bricklaying pays more, and he can then pay people to help him farm.  His work place is located 20 minutes away, and he travels there by bicycle, working from 6 until 1 in the afternoon.  The loan that he is requesting though CREDICAMPO is to buy 4 bags of manure that his field needs, so that he can cultivate the 14,000 square meters that he has seeded.  He will also buy a liter of pesticide to combat pests that are afflicting his corn.  This will help a great deal, because with the money he can buy fertilizer that is good for this kind of pest.  Jose's dream is to continue working the land so that his children will have food at home.  He also wants to help them to go to school so that they can be educated, because he knows that this will help them a lot.  He knows that this will take a great deal of work and effort.

loans.use: to buy 4 bags of manure that his field needs, so that he can cultivate the 14,000 square meters that he has seeded.  He will also buy a liter of pesticide to combat pests that are afflicting his corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more bags of coal to sell.

loans.name: Victoriana Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario lo integran cuatro socias laboriosas, lo coordina la señora Pilar de 44 años de edad, acompañada y madre de dos hijos, se dedica a la comercialización de ropa nueva y cosméticos a los pobladores de su comunidad, este negocio lo impulso hace dos años con ayudad de su compañero de vida que le dio un aporte financiero para que impulsara su negocio, para mantener el negocio la socia solicita el crédito para invertir en productos como es camisetas, blusas, ropa interior, cremas corporales, perfumes para dama, perfumes para caballeros, etc. Las otras socias son las señoras Darling de 26 años de edad comerciante de cosméticos desde hace seis años a las pobladores de su comunidad, Anelia de 33 años de edad ofrece el servicio de comidera en su domicilio desde hace cinco años, y Nubia comerciante de ropa y calzado de manera ambulante desde hace tres años.
texts.en: This group consists of four hard-working members. The coordinator is 44 year old Pilar, who is married and mother to two children. She sells new clothing and cosmetics to members of her community. She started this business 2 years ago with help from her husband who gave her financing to launch the business. To maintain the business she seeks a loan to invest in products such as t-shirts, blouses, underwear, body cream, women's perfume, men's cologne, etc.  The other members of the group are 26 year old Darling who has been selling cosmetics from her home for 6 years, and 33 year old Anelia who has been selling home-cooked food from her home for 5 years, and Nubia who has been working as a street vendor selling clothing and shoes for 3 years.

loans.use: to buy t-shirts, blouses, underwear, body cream, women's perfume, men's cologne, etc.
